text:
The government on Monday said it had credited revised pensionary benefits along with arrears under one-rank one-pension (OROP) scheme to more than 2 lakh pensioners drawing service and disability pensions.

As to the more than 1.46 lakh family pensioners, the government will credit the new benefits by the end of this month, the Defence Ministry said in a statement.

Defence Pension Disbursing Offices [DPDOs] under the Controller General of Defence Accounts have released revised pensionary benefits to 2,21,224 defence pensioners .

— PTI
title: OROP: over 2 lakh get revised benefits
